verses.translation: No kubera amasezerano yabo arebana n’ingendo (z’ubucuruzi) zo mu gihe cy’ubukonje no mu cy’impeshyi (batekanye),
Ngaho nibagaragire (Allah) Nyagasani nyir’iyi ngoro (Al Ka’abat),

verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
verses.translation: (We) wabagaburiye mu gihe cy’amapfa, ndetse akanabaha umutekano mu gihe cy’ubwoba.
